name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in optimizing deployment pipelines and infrastructure management using **Azure**, **AWS**, **Ansible**, **Terraform**, **Kubernetes**, and **Jenkins**. Proficient in Infrastructure as Code and automation, leveraging **Bash**, **PowerShell**, and **Linux** for system management. Skilled in monitoring and observability tools including **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, **Elastic**, and **Kibana** to ensure high availability and system performance.

My background as a Full Stack Developer enriches my DevOps role by bringing a strong understanding of application architectures and the development lifecycle, employing **Python** for scripting and automation. I have successfully led initiatives that resulted in reduced deployment times by up to 50%, and increased system reliability through robust CI/CD practices using **GitLab**. I am also well-versed in observability tools like **Jaeger** and **Kiali** for tracing and monitoring.

Passionate about creating efficient solutions that are in compliance with industry standards, I leverage my technical skill set to deliver top-notch DevOps strategies that support business goals.
